name: Postal office operator
description:
Game made for the third Discord Jam within 48h hours.

With the theme of the jam being "distribution" I decided to make a similar game to 911 Operator where instead of managing firetrucks, police and medical care you have to manage mail.

With increasing level more and more households want to send mail and the player receives an increasing amount of cars to collect these.

With the time the player will start to be overwhelmed by the amount of packages having to be delivered and will eventually come to an halt
